projects.title: Vite Dynamic Prefetch plugin
projects.description: A Vite plugin that supports prefetching dynamic modules at runtime. Published as an NPM package and featured in Vite.js Community.
projects.summary:
A Vite plugin designed to optimize web application performance by enabling prefetching for dynamic imports at runtime.

Key Highlights:

  • Enhanced Performance: Automatically generates prefetch links for dynamically imported modules to reduce loading delays.
  • Simple Integration: Easily integrated into Vite projects with minimal setup.
  • Published on NPM: Available as an NPM package for easy installation.
  • Featured in Vite.js Community: Included in curated lists of awesome Vite.js tools and plugins.

projects.title: Belle E-commerce
projects.description: Belle-Ecommerce is a full-stack web application built with the PERN stack (PostgreSQL, Express, React, Node.js) that offers typical e-commerce functionalities.
projects.summary:
Description
Belle-Ecommerce is a full-stack web application built with the PERN stack (PostgreSQL, Express, React, Node.js) that offers typical e-commerce functionalities, including product browsing for customers and shop management for administrators. It served as the final project for the Software Analysis and Design course.

Key Features

  • Customer Experience:

    • Browse products by name, category, brand, and price range.
    • Add, update, and remove items from the shopping cart.
    • Place orders and review products after purchase (in progress).
    • Search blog posts by title or topic and view content.

  • Shop Management:

    • Blog (Editor role): Create, update, and delete blog topics and posts.
    • Product (Editor role): Manage products, categories, brands, and variants.
    • User (Admin role): Manage user profiles and search by personal info.
    • Order (Admin role): Search orders, update statuses, and generate reports.
    • Reports (Admin role): Display monthly stats, sales, and top-selling products.

Technology Stack

  • Backend: PostgreSQL, TypeORM, Express (with TypeScript), TSOA (OpenAPI REST API), JSON Web Token, Morgan, and Winston for logging.
  • Frontend: React, Material-UI, Redux (with Thunk middleware), Axios, Cloudinary for image storage.

projects.title: ALi Chat
projects.description: ALi Chat is a simple MERN stack web application designed to implement and demonstrate skills in Node.js, React, Redux, and Socket.IO.
projects.summary:
ALi Chat is a simple MERN stack web application designed to implement and demonstrate skills in Node.js, React, Redux, and Socket.IO. The app provides basic chat functionality with real-time messaging.

Key Features

  • Authentication: Login, register, and social login with Google and Facebook.
  • Search: Search for users by name or username.
  • Messaging: Send text, emojis, and images, with support for replying to specific messages.
  • Group Chat: Manage group members as a host (add/remove members) or leave as a member.

Technology Stack

  • Backend: Node.js, Express, MongoDB (MongoAtlas), Mongoose, Socket.IO, Cloudinary, JSON Web Token.
  • Frontend: React, Material-UI, Redux (with Thunk middleware), Axios, and Socket.IO-Client.
